Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget

Annotation Interface Widget

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface Widget
An annotation for indicating controlling the common widget metadata of a given field. Depending on the type of the field being annotated and in case there is no other widget annotation present, a default widget will be displayed in the dialog (see DefaultNodeSettings for details). In case the default widget is not desired, an additional specialized widget-annotation (e.g. TextInputWidget) can be used to customize it.
Author:
Marc Bux, KNIME GmbH, Berlin, Germany

  • Element Details

    • title

      String title
      Returns:
      the title / label of the field
      Default:
      ""

    • description

      String description
      Returns:
      the description of the field (for tooltips or node descriptions)
      Default:
      ""

    • advanced

      boolean advanced
      Returns:
      true if the annotated setting is advanced
      Default:
      false

    • hideTitle

      boolean hideTitle
      Returns:
      true if the title should be hidden from the dialog, but should still be available in the node description.
      Default:
      false
